fields.label: Location
fields.name: location
fields.instructions: Is this page for Michigan, Chicago or No Location

fields.label: Page Components
fields.name: page_components
fields.instructions: Use These Fields To Build Your Pages

sub_fields.label: Page header graphic
sub_fields.name: page_header_graphic
sub_fields.instructions: Image to sit on top of featured image background. Optimal size is 748px x 337px.

sub_fields.label: Video Header Choice
sub_fields.name: video_header_choice
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which video you would like to show.

sub_fields.label: Hero Image
sub_fields.name: hero_image
sub_fields.instructions: This is the large image to go across the top below the header navigation. Recommended size is 1920 x 686 but any image with this ratio can work. Be aware that images smaller than 1920px will be pixilated.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: If you choose to use this fields, you MUST also include the Check Availability Form on your page. If you do not and someone uses the field, it will not scroll or close the animation.

sub_fields.label: Repeating Fields
sub_fields.name: repeating_fields
sub_fields.instructions: Small Subtitle, title, content and large background image. Create as many as you want. These are what is used for service pages.

sub_fields.label: Section Content Field
sub_fields.name: section_content_field
sub_fields.instructions: Field content, if you want to add a video, give your anchor tag a class of service-btn and href of video url.

sub_fields.label: Would You Like to add A Video, Gallery or Link?
sub_fields.name: would_you_like_to_add_a_video_or_gallery

sub_fields.label: Would You like to Add Additional Buttons
sub_fields.name: additional_buttons_select

sub_fields.label: Button Link
sub_fields.name: button_link
sub_fields.instructions: if you want to link to the contact form, use this pages url and add #service-check-availability to the end

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Displays links to Uplightling, Shutterbooth and Not A Wedding. There are no options for this field.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This displays the Free Guide component. There are no options for this field.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This field display the latest 3 posts from Hubspot blog. There are no options for this field.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This displays the Heart To Serve page component. There are no options for this field.

sub_fields.label: Read More Button Url
sub_fields.name: read_more_button_url
sub_fields.instructions: URL you would like this reviews read more button to link to

sub_fields.label: Package Image
sub_fields.name: package_image
sub_fields.instructions: Recomended size is 411px X 490px, but should be adjusted based on the content. Image hidden on mobile.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This displays the latest reviews page component. There are no options for this field.

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Place Image, Title and Link for each. These are used to replace the More About Us and Opportunities Links

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Place Image, Title and Link for each. These are used to replace the More About Us and Opportunities Links

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This displays the Check Availability button on the right side of the screen. It also loads the modals required. There are no available options for this field.

sub_fields.label: Check Availability Form Title
sub_fields.name: check_availability_form_title
sub_fields.instructions: Give the form a title. This makes it specific for your page.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Displays the DJ Employment Form.  It is sent to the location determined by page location ( Detroit or Chicago ). There are no options for this field.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Displays the Photography Employment Form.  It is sent to the location determined by page location ( Detroit or Chicago ). There are no options for this field.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Displays the Videography Employment Form.  It is sent to the location determined by page location ( Detroit or Chicago ). There are no options for this field.
